_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Van Drunen Farms (VDF) Manteno Cold Storage is a frozen warehouse engaged in storing and distributing frozen food products for VDF Manufacturing facilities and to area retail outlets.  To maintain frozen conditions in the warehouse, VDF operates a mechanical refrigeration system in which the refrigerant is anhydrous ammonia.  No manufacturing is done at the site.  Products are brought to the site by truck for storage;  various assortments of these products are then assembled for reshipment to area outlets.



This refrigeration plant was newly constructed in 1987 and recently purchased by VDF.  VDF maintains an active safety management program to prevent accidental releases of ammonia.  The facility complies with OSHA's PSM regulation and maintains the associated documentation.  Periodic training and drills are conducted to ensure familiarity with all emergency procedures.



A rigorous program of operator training, preventive maintenance, and periodic inspections is maintained to prevent the accidental release of ammonia, and all required safety programs are in force at the facility.  

Since VDF purchased the facility, there have been no reportable accidental releases of ammonia and no accidents involving the release of ammonia.  VDF has coordinated emergency response activities with the local (Manteno) Fire Department which is less than one (1) mile away.



The facility is located to the East of the Village of Manteno, in a county  location which remains rural in nature.  The refrigeration system is adequate for the amount of cooling needed, and is capable of holding 26,000 lbs of anhydrous ammonia.  All ammonia is stored in the system; there is no additional storage on-site.



VDF personnel are trained to respond to minor releases and minor repair/maintenance problems.  However, for a major release, the facility would call upon the Manteno Fire Department for emergency response.  Facility personnel are trained in response actions which consist of minimizing da
mage to the facility while assisting the orderly evacuation of all personnel.  VDF regularly evaluates and implements any appropriate measures to further improve safety.
